actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

official_title: To amend the Act of March 3, 1931 (known as the Davis-Bacon Act) to require that contract work covered by the Act which requires licensing be performed by a person who is so licensed.

summary.text: Amends the Davis-Bacon Act to require that a covered contract in a State which requires licensing be performed by a person who is so licensed.

titles.title: To amend the Act of March 3, 1931 (known as the Davis-Bacon Act) to require that contract work covered by the Act which requires licensing be performed by a person who is so licensed.
